Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to be followed by SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all variants that include reviewer agreement phases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs

Name: Elapsed time between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where at least one reviewer agreed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision after the last SW-Reviewer Agreed event in a case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in high-frequency variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision relative to the completion of all assigned reviewer agreements (i.e., after the final SW-Reviewer Agreed)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from the first SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in multi-reviewer cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time for SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases that originated from SW-EIC Major Revision versus SW-EIC Minor Revision paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' and the end of case where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision occurs

Name: Elapsed time between Manuscript Export Succeeded (post-revision) and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in revised submission variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between the last reminder activity (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2) and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in complex reviewer assignment variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants involving major or minor revision cycles
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting EIC Decision and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Awaiting EIC Decision to occur after all required reviewers have agreed (i.e., no further SW-Reviewer Declined or No Response events follow)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
